headings: Develop a better understanding of yourself and the world around you.
What Can You Do With a Philosophy Degree?
Why Earn My B.A. in Philosophy Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: If you wonder about things and take the “whys” seriously, earning your bachelor’s degree in philosophy could be the right choice for you.

Our degree plan covers everything from philosophy of mind, religion, science and technology - to political philosophy, logic, ethics and metaphysics. When you major in philosophy, you will gain the communication, leadership, flexibility and critical-thinking skills that will help you succeed in any career field or in graduate school. Plus, you’ll have the opportunity to attend state philosophy conferences.
Our experienced faculty are partners with our students. Our smaller class sizes are typically set up seminar style, allowing you to really connect with your professors and other students.
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.

Earning your philosophy degree can open career doors for you in a wide variety of settings, including everything from education, ministry, medicine, law and business - to government, criminal justice, public relations and technical writing. Our graduates go on to excel in law school and graduate school, as well as obtain leadership positions in a variety of sectors.

Our program has been ranked as one of the ”100 Great Value Colleges for Philosophy Degrees” by the GreatValueColleges.com college guide. Our commitment to helping you succeed and graduate with as little debt as possible runs deep.

Our goal is to facilitate the accumulation of the cultural capital you will require as you find your place in society. You will have the opportunity to interact with students throughout Texas at conferences, as well as conduct research that enhances your global understanding.

Our seminar-style classes allow discussion to flourish between our faculty and students. Plus, you can join our Philosophy Club, a very active registered student organization that allows you to further build your relationships with fellow philosophy majors and your professors.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
